trans-unit.source: Authentication for TYPO3 backend and frontend login using YubiKey OTP two-factor authentication.

The YubiKey provider enables you to strength your accounts' security by requiring a one-time password on every login. The one-time password will then be automatically generated by your registered YubiKeys when pressing the corresponding button and filled into the provided form.
Setting up: 1. Insert each YubiKey to be registered and press the corresponding button 2. Ensure that only one ID per line is present 3. Submit the form to activate the provider
YubiKey ID(s) - one per line. (Insert YubiKey and press the YubiKey button)
Insert your YubiKey and press the button
